definition: to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment

sentences.chinese: 气压式头部音乐按摩器。

sentences.english: Spread abundant quantities of cream and massage carefully until absorbed.
sentences.chinese: 涂抹足量的霜，并且仔细按摩，直至完全吸收。

sentences.english: How would you rank the brand perception of massage chair?
sentences.chinese: 你将如何排名对按摩椅品牌的观感？

sentences.english: Restore luster to the skin, the beauty parlor every week or self-massage time.
sentences.chinese: 令肌肤恢复光泽，每周可以到美容院或自行按摩一次。

sentences.english: Did you want to get a swedish or a shiatsu massage?
sentences.chinese: 你想要一个瑞典式的，还是日式的按摩？

sentences.english: Apply BF1 Hair Growth Conditioner onto scalp. Gently massage for 5 minutes then rinse Off.
sentences.chinese: 把护发精华搽在头皮上，按摩5分钟，把头发洗净。

sentences.english: Hot massage for a while, and then use a spoon to stimulate it to soak in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 热按摩片刻后，再用一把泡在冷水里的匙子刺激该处。

sentences.english: Finishing strokes in Swedish massage involve swooping around the body in a butterfly motion.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典按摩整理招涉及身体周围的蝴蝶飞在议案。

sentences.english: Generously padded footbed massages the foot with each and every step.
sentences.chinese: 慷慨填充鞋垫按摩脚每一步。

sentences.english: Please follow the attendant into the massage parlor .
sentences.chinese: 当然，请跟服务生去按摩室吧。

sentences.english: Massage therapists and fitness trainers work fewer hours per week than any other professionals.
sentences.chinese: 按摩师和健身教练每周的工作时间比其他职业都要少。

sentences.english: Chengdu massage, my mother and I stood in Shenzhen station waiting for grandpa.
sentences.chinese: 成都保健按摩，我和妈妈站在深圳的车站等着外公。

sentences.english: He recommends regular hot water rinses and massaging of the scalp with fingertips.
sentences.chinese: 他建议使用温热水漂洗，而且用手指点触按摩头皮。

sentences.english: I'll treat you with massage on foot.
sentences.chinese: 我将用足部按摩法给您治疗。

sentences.english: I guess all of us would agree that we can never have enough massaging gadgets.
sentences.chinese: 我猜想我们都认同现在的按摩工具功能都不够齐全。

definition: tui na (form of Chinese manual therapy)
form of therapeutic massage, mainly for children, in which a roll of skin is squeezed, working from the base of the spine to the neck (TCM)
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
to win honor/to put on a stern face/to have a facial (beauty treatment)
to nurse one's health/to recuperate/to take care of/to look after/to discipline/to educate/to train/to prepare food/(dialect) to make fun of/(medicine) to opsonize
